ygData.subject: DONT DONT DONT
ygData.msgSnippet: DONT!  Try to charm Tarskuk at level 28, he WILL eat you, he was red at level 30 (which means he s outside the charm window) I successfully charmed him at 33,
ygData.messageBody:
DONT! Try to charm Tarskuk at level 28, he WILL eat you, he was red at
level 30 (which means he's outside the charm window)

I successfully charmed him at 33, however. He's the same level as HG's.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
51 - Test, 42 - Saryrn

----- Original Message -----
From: "John Tatsukawa" <john@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:34 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors


> You're really close to Rathe Mountain zone. Head there and charm cyclopses
> to fight other clopses or giant skeletons. If you're really good with
> charm/selo's you can charm Tarskuk and have him wipe everything out for
> you. But he is faster than normal clops, so you might have to zone if you
> get into trouble.
>
> ---Windleaf
>
>
> At 10:33 AM 6/2/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >Hail
> >
> > My bard is 28, and if I have to spend another day running around
> >chickenville in SK looking for Harriers and Avocets during primetime I am
> >going to go nuts. I enjoy the charming in the outdoors and made it
through
> >level 27 and half way in to 28 with out a scratch on me =). Does anyone
> >know anything outdoors (especially static spawns) that is worth going
after
> >at this level using charm? The chickens were nice because the spawns
were
> >static in the village. I know there is Choon and Froon but they are
> >usually camped. Though the centuar spawns in the stables are static I
> >found it to be a bit risky.
>
>
